The Rent Index

The Rent Index is a snapshot of rental availabilities within a given market. Unlike other less accurate market indices, the RentJuice Rent Index is not based on polling or samples of large corporate property owners; it reflects real-time information about the fragmented world of rental housing.

View the Rent Indexes
